name: testLogInWithInvalidData
description: Checking the error message display when logging in with invalid data
descriptionHtml: Checking the error message display when logging in with invalid data

testStage.description: Checking the error message display when logging in with invalid data

steps.name: click 'Manage Jenkins' link from Main page
Click Manage Users on ManageJenkins Page
Click 'Logo' button and move to main page
input user name 'incorrect user name' in the input field on Login Page
input password 'p@ssword123' in the input field on Login Page
Click 'Sign in' button on Login Page
Get message 'Incorrect username or password' on Login Page
Logout from instance http://localhost:8081/
